email.subject: Thanks for the tip.
email.body:
Hey there #PLAYERNAME#,
I have recently been informed that you have submitted a report to us linked to a case we've been working on for quite some time, dating all the way back to the first Hacker Wars I don't know how you came across this evidence but it will be the perfect to finally close this case against Lazarus.
You can be asserted that we will keep this tip completely anonymous so you will not need to worry about getting found out.
- Agent Eriksson Co-Founder of International Cyber Division
